name: Simon's Jazz Drums
description:
Simon's Jazz Drums is a musical and skill game based on the classic game Simon Says and the movie Whiplash, in which the player plays a colorful jazz drum kit.

Some of the creamings/sentences of the game, represent part of my musical education where some teachers were not really nice, as it shows the film Whiplash.

If you achieve more than 4000 points, the jam session starts!

Game design, code and music: J. Felipe Molina

External assets used:

- Drummer icon made by Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com

- Painting shader: Daniel Ilett, twitter:@daniel_ilett
